channel.title: That same ugly mustache, can't change it!
channel.description: I dont know what's wrong...No matter what I try to do, (or anyone else) we can't change that ugly mustache on my server! You cant become bald (no mustache or beard) and you cant have a beard. Just that same ugly black/brown mustache! PLEASE HELP!

item.title: That same ugly mustache, can't change it!
item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

But I already have one!

Edit: And it works! The only thing you CANT change is beards/mustaches. (You can change it on the char menu, it just wont update your char with the beard/mustache afterwards)

Read full topic
item.source: That same ugly mustache, can't change it!

item.title: That same ugly mustache, can't change it!
item.dc:creator: @MrPink MrPink
item.description:
@MrPink wrote:

Search the forums for a tutorial on how to put the ::char command into your server.

Read full topic
